item.description: Reposted here are the essays I wrote in my third year of my BA Politics (Hons) degree.

item.title: NHoS
item.description: NHoS - an OS for the NHS (aka NHSbuntu)

item.title: Brent East
item.description: From 2004 to 2011 I blogged about the political machinations around Brent East and Brent Council. I began with a blog called “Sarah Teather Is My MP”, and later with a blog called “Brent East Campaigning”. I have an extensive archive of campaign materials from all the parties / candidates at the 2005 and 2010 general elections. Brent East Campaigning blog (2006), source: Internet Archive Posts

item.title: Community Wifi
item.description: I setup several community wifi groups and started a company to provide technical support for them. The first network was the Queen’s Park Wireless Club in London NW6. Queen’s Park Community Network homepage, source: Internet Archive Posts
